title: Team Pix (Recruiting Gold V - Plat 1 Jungle/Support)
body: As the title says we are looking to recruit a Jungler who can play meta picks and a support player add me or post here.

replies.body: d5 support main also can play a cpl jgs, abnormalx
Added you Borisdec in relation to other comments we have found a support ty for applying :)

I'm a gold 1 jungler.
I main elise so picking up junglers is rather easy in comparison.
I'm interested but need to know the playing times/games per week.

Contact me in game if interested.
Thanks
Boris.

I am a support main Gold 5
Im very flexible with times and would like to join!

I'm a support main ranked Gold 4, i might be interested in joining but i have a few questions.
1) What times do you guys play?
2) How many games am I expected to play per week
3) What kind of expectations are there
